participant_1.background:
I sometimes write poetry.
My favorite color is black.
I want to visit the uk.
I sing in a punk band.

participant_2.background:
When i turned 18 , my family moved across the country.
On weekends i go out with friends.
I eat eggs and bacon for breakfast.
I like going to rock concerts.

content.text: Hi! I'm [user 1].
Hi [user 1]. I'm [user 2].
Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like going out with friends, going to rock concerts, and eating eggs and bacon for breakfast.
That's cool! I like writing poetry, singing in a punk band, and visiting the UK.
Wow, you're so versatile! I've never been to the UK, but I'd love to go.
It's really beautiful there! I've been a few times and I always have a great time.
I'm sure I would too. What kind of poetry do you write?
I write all kinds of poetry, but I'm most interested in writing about love, loss, and the human experience.
Those are all great topics! I'd love to read some of your work sometime.
I'd be happy to share it with you! Do you like to go to punk concerts?
I do! I love the energy and the music.
Me too! I've been to a few punk concerts and I always have a great time.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have a favorite band?
I have a few favorite bands, but I'd have to say my favorite is The Clash.
The Clash! I love them too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I'm glad to hear that! They're a great band.
I agree! They're so talented.
They are! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think it's great to meet people who share your interests.
